mn65:4.2: bhuñjamāno ekāsano yāpessasī”ti → bhuñjamāno yāpessasīti (bj, s1-3, km, pts1)
mn65:22.2: pasayha pasayha → pavayha pavayha (bj, s1-3, km, pts1)
mn65:32.2: sarasi → sarasi tvaṃ (bj, s2, s3, pts1) | sarasi taṃ (?)
mn65:33.7: davatte → ravatthe (si, s1, s2, km, pts1) | varatthe (s3), khurakāse → khurakāye (si, pts1)
mn65:33.10: pāṇiyañca → valiyañca (bj, pts1) | baliyaṃ ca (s1-3, km)
